name: Aditi
body:
### about aditi, the nexus system for newbies! ![](http://orig08.deviantart.net/2a04/f/2016/054/b/a/mini_pen_icon__pastel_turqoise__by_gasara-d9stify.gif)
***
 First of all, thank you for using my reflex package! Aditi was specially designed with new players of the game in mind; its features are both little and big, meant to help ease the way into the vast and sometimes overwhelming world of Lusternia. Suggestions, bugs/issues and all other forms of feedback are very welcome and can be submitted at : < blahblahblah >.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
